Class Similarity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Similarity

  • public class Similarity
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements functions to calculate mathematical formulas that are closely related with machine learning applications.
    Since:
    SDK 1.8
    Author:
    Marc Shepherd

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Similarity() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static double calculateCosineSimilarity(double[] cosArray1, double[] cosArray2)
      Calculates the cosine similarity of 2 equal-length arrays using the formula: Dot product of two arrays over the magnitudes of each multiplied together
      static double calculateEuclideanDistance(double[] eucArray1, double[] eucArray2)
      Calculates the euclidean distance of 2 equal-length arrays using the formulas sqrt((pi - qi)^2 + ...
      static int calculateHamming(java.lang.String binary1, java.lang.String binary2)
      Calculates hamming distance, which counts the number of bits that are not similar to each other

      • calculateEuclideanDistance

        public static double calculateEuclideanDistance(double[] eucArray1,
                                                double[] eucArray2)
        Calculates the euclidean distance of 2 equal-length arrays using the formulas sqrt((pi - qi)^2 + ... + (p(i+1) + q(i+1))^2)
        Parameters:
        eucArray1 -
        eucArray2 -
        Returns:
        euclidean distance
